body:
Is this some sort or glitch, because I thought mobs were removed in Walls. In fact, I died from falling into a whole bunch of them. If you look closely in the pictures you can see that I was shot by a skeleton.

If this is a glitch, could the Map Devs fix this?

Pics:
body_tagged:
Is this some sort or glitch, because I thought mobs were removed in Walls. In fact, I died from falling into a whole bunch of them. If you look closely in the pictures you can see that I was shot by a skeleton.

Pics:
title: Why? Mobs? In Walls?

replies.body: I dont think it is a glitch. When they did the update to the Tetris maps they started to show up... If it is a glitch I am sure our Awesome Map Devs already know about it and will take care of it asap.
replies.body_tagged: I dont think it is a glitch. When they did the update to the Tetris maps they started to show up... If it is a glitch I am sure our Awesome Map Devs already know about it and will take care of it asap.

replies.body: I made a post about this it is only in the map Tetris Jungle. http://avicus.net/forums/8e1a4ede3
replies.body_tagged: I made a post about this it is only in the map Tetris Jungle. http://avicus.net/forums/8e1a4ede3

replies.body:
It doesn't seem like a glitch because there's a kit especially for spawning mobs.. 
I feel like if there was a kit for that, there would be some natural spawning ones, too. 
I personally like it-- it adds some vanilla feel in :D
